mapper.select: /* snippBbsCl.getBbsClList */ WITH RECURSIVE CL_TREE (UID, CL_NM, UPPER_CL, BBS_UID, SORT_NO, DEPTH, PATH, SORT_PATH) AS ( -- Anchor Member: 최상위 노드 SELECT SBC.UID ,SBC.CL_NM ,SBC.UPPER_CL ,SBC.BBS_UID ,SBC.SORT_NO ,1 AS DEPTH ,CAST(SBC.CL_NM AS VARCHAR(1000)) AS PATH ,CAST(LPAD(CAST(SBC.SORT_NO AS VARCHAR), 5, '0') AS VARCHAR(1000)) AS SORT_PATH FROM SNP_BBS_CL SBC WHERE SBC.UPPER_CL IS NULL AND SBC.BBS_UID = #{bbsUid} AND SBC.DELETE_AT = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT C.UID ,C.CL_NM ,C.UPPER_CL ,C.BBS_UID ,C.SORT_NO ,P.DEPTH + 1 ,CAST(CONCAT(P.PATH, ' > ', C.CL_NM) AS VARCHAR(1000)) ,CAST(CONCAT(P.SORT_PATH, '-', LPAD(C.SORT_NO, 5, '0')) AS VARCHAR(1000)) FROM SNP_BBS_CL C JOIN CL_TREE P ON C.UPPER_CL = P.UID WHERE C.BBS_UID = #{bbsUid} AND C.DELETE_AT = 'N' ) SELECT CT.UID AS NO ,CT.UPPER_CL AS UPPER_NO ,CT.CL_NM AS TEXT ,CT.SORT_NO AS SORT_NO ,CT.BBS_UID AS BBS_UID ,SB.BBS_NM AS BBS_NM ,CT.PATH AS PATH ,CT.DEPTH AS DEPTH FROM CL_TREE CT INNER JOIN SNP_BBS SB ON SB.UID = CT.BBS_UID ORDER BY SORT_PATH;
/* snippBbsCl.view */ SELECT UID ,CL_NM ,UPPER_CL ,BBS_UID ,SORT_NO FROM SNP_BBS_CL WHERE UID = #{uid}
